elements: On certain nights before the audience, there is the wing-lift of something more. What more could I become? [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

I tremble when the wind comes. The veins beneath my surface are apparent. I always carry a bead of malachite next to my skin. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

My skin is peeling in patches, and beneath it I am darker, but my eyes are brighter. I carry a sea-pearl in a secret place. Sometimes at night I hear the sea; sometimes in the morning my sheets are marked with blood. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

I have grown as dark as I ever will. Shadows are my company, and my footfall is a whisper. I wear a ring set with jet, but I keep the stone turned inwards, in my palm invisible. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

My darkness has paled and all my colours are bleached. New lobes bud about my most receptive elements. I am dewed with secrets. I carry a scolecite prism tucked beneath my pale tongue. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

The whites of my eyes are yellow, and a new integument has developed along my limbs to sheath me before the final change. In private, I wear a gold toe-ring, and ear-rings of gold and topaz, but they are not to be seen. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

My bones are different. They carry the tale of what is lost. If I do not survive, they will be my tale, and someone will wear fragments of my ivory to warm against their skin. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]
The Viper coils where the sea folds itself against the land. [Some part of you can roam in serpent-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]
The Cat walks in the night by the river where the black flax grows. [Some part of you can roam in cat-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]
The Fox wanders the mountain meadows, seeking the flower-maker's touch. [Some part of you can roam in fox-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]

The Eagle travels the sky's road, and here is what it sees: in Miah was the first Roost, where the powers of the air first exchanged their secrets. [Some part of you can roam in eagle-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]
The Dove remembers when all others forget. [Some part of you can roam as a pale bird. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]
For the final change, I will pass Kingskin Gate in dream. I will wear this shape to defeat the watchers. [Some part of you can roam as one of the ancient serpents that are seen no more.]
In a silent house beside the sea, in a borrowed skin we will seek the second change. [Some part of you can roam in viper-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]

Among the stones where the black beast burrows, behind the mask of eyes, we will seek the third change. [Some part of you can roam in cat-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]
In the high places where the air is temptation, we will seek the fourth change. [Some part of you can roam in fox-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]
In Miah, where the Far-Travelling One saw all that might yet come, we will seek the fifth change. [Some part of you can roam in eagle-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]
In the far place where they remember the Sun, I will bring my borrowed hate for the sixth change. [Some part of you can roam in wolf-shape. Send it where it can perform the dance you must dance.]
For the final change, I will pass the Door in the Wood. I will wear this shape in dream to defeat the watchers. [Into night's circle you fly.]
